body:
hey guys how's it going,I will be recording some videos if you would like to play online with me you may I don't really care I just want to be able to be battleing people that want to Battle me so yeah anyway I Really don't know any of the server's I'm on usually cause most of the time th just join randomly is so I really have no clue if you guys will be able to join or not it's not my fault if you can't sorry if you can't and you really want to so I anyways I think that's about it to tell me another thing you want me to do or play comment or whatever this thing even is and send it to me so I can read it thanks

       Sincerly,
         EpicCraftMC

title: Plz PvP me! :)

replies.body:
Please do not make useless threads such as this. If you want to PvP others, ask them ingame, not here.
